colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @155B CES DUS TSIGS KYI RNAM BZHAG KUN GSAL ME LONG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, ,KHU RE CHEN MO'I GRVA RIGS MING BTAS GNYIS LDAN GYI BSHAD SGRUB BSTAN DAR ZHES BYA BAS, ,GNAM GYI RIGS LAS BRGYUD PA'I SA SKYONG CHEN PO AAM BAN CHENG WANG GI RIGS SRAS LHA YI BTZUN PA MDO SNGAGS GZHUNG LA SBYANGS PA'I 'BRAS RTAGS SU MING BTAGS GNYIS KYIS MING ZUR BRGYAN PA'I SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BSTAN PA RGYA MTSOS SNGA MO NAS BSKUL MA MDZAD PAR KHU RE CHEN MO'I DGA' LDAN THEG CHEN GLING GI NYE 'DAB RANG SHONG SPYIL BUR MGO RTZOM NAS BAR SKABS SU RNAM GA-YENGS SNA TSOGS KYIS BREL TE LHAG MAR LUS PA LA SLAR MAR YANG NYID KYIS DRAN BSKUL BYAS SHING, ,DON GNYER CAN GZHAN GYI KYANG BSKUL BAR BRTEN, ,RAB 'BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I NYAG MA SO GSUM PA LEGS SBYAR SAm SKRE TA SKAD DU BI K'A RI, STOD 'GREL LAS @156A *, ,BOD YUL GYI SKAD DU SGYUR BYED, MAH'A TZI NA'I SKAD DU GYI HA'I, ,DBANG THANG DAD BSDUN PA'I MING SA MO PHAG LO'I, HOR ZLA DANG PO'I YAR NGO'I TSES BCU BZHI PA CHO 'PHRUL DUS CHEN DAD BYANG PHYOGS 'GRO BA'I MGON PO RJE BTZUN DAM PA SKU PHRENG DANG PO'I DGONGS RDZOGS DUS CHEN GNYIS 'DZOM PA, ,NAM MKHA'I NOR BU, ,SNA TSOGS LHA LDAN GYI DGA' MAR RTZE DAGS ROL ZHING, ,MIG GSUM GTZUG NOR GDENGS CAN DGA' MAR 'KHYUD PA'I BKRA SHIS DGE MTSAN 'BAR BA'I NYIN CHEN WANG SHOG GI DGON SDER MJUG RDZOGS PAR SBYAR BA'I SHOG GUR PHEBS PA'I BYED PA PO RTZIS RAMS PA DAR RGYAS, ,DGE BSHES DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS, ,DGE BSHES DGE SLONG BSTAN 'DZIN 'OD ZER GYIS PA SARBBA D'A SHRE YA WA RDHE shU BHA WANTU, ,GZHUNG LUGS PAD TSAL RGYAS PA LA, ,BLO GSAL RKANG DRUG 'DU BA'I PHYIR, ,PAR GYI 'PHRUL 'DEGS DGA' TSAL 'DI, ,CHIN WANG SHOG GI DGON PAR BSGRUBS, ,)
